    HW4_zfergus2

    public class HW3_zfergus2
extends HW2_zfergus2
    HW03 of CS451 Computer Graphics: Draws geometric primitives bouncing in between a rectangle and a circle inside said rectangle. Use 2D transformations to achieve this task.
    Author:
    Zachary Ferguson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void display(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable drawable)

        Specified by:

      • reshape

        public void reshape(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable drawable,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height)
        Method called for OpenGL rendering every reshape. Adjusts the width and height stored values. Calculate the radius of the circle. Centers the viewport so (0,0) is in the center.
        Specified by:
        reshape in interface javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
        Overrides:
        reshape in class HW2_zfergus2
        Parameters:
        drawable - Needed, but unused parameter.
        x - X position of the frame.
        y - Y position of the frame.
        width - The new width of the frame.
        height - The new height of the frame.
        See Also:
        GLEventListener
